data.name: textBox.Text
data.value:
Terms and Conditions for Hospital Management App
1. App Usage
1.1. The App is intended for use by authorized healthcare professionals and staff for the purpose of managing patient records, appointments, billing, and other related administrative tasks. 1.2. You agree to use the App in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations, including those related to patient confidentiality and data protection. 1.3. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your login credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.
2. Data Privacy
2.1. We are committed to protecting the privacy and security of your data. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for details on how we collect, use, and disclose your information. 2.2. You agree to comply with all applicable data protection laws and regulations when using the App, including obtaining any necessary consents from patients for the collection and processing of their personal information.
3. Intellectual Property 3.1. The App, including all content, features, and functionality, is owned by us and is protected by intellectual property laws. 3.2. You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the App for its intended purpose.
4. Limitation of Liability 4.1. We disclaim any liability for any damages or losses arising out of or in connection with your use of the App, including but not limited to loss of data, revenue, or profits. 4.2. In no event shall we be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with these Terms or the use of the App.
5. Modification of Terms 5.1. We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time without prior notice. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the App. 5.2. Your continued use of the App after the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of such changes.
6. Termination 6.1. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the App at any time for any reason without liability. 6.2. Upon termination, your right to use the App will cease immediately.
7. Governing Law 7.1. These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Bangladesh, without regard to its conflict of law provisions
8. Contact Us If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact with Admins.
These terms and conditions govern your access to and use of the Hospital Management App provided by us. By accessing or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not access or use the App.
